00060 using namespace btk;
00061 
00062 
00063 bool IsInsideMask(Point p, Mask::Pointer mask)
00064 {
00065     Mask::IndexType index;
00066     index[0] = std::floor(p.x() + 0.5);
00067     index[1] = std::floor(p.y() + 0.5);
00068     index[2] = std::floor(p.z() + 0.5);
00069 
00070     MaskRegion region = mask->GetLargestPossibleRegion();
00071 
00072     bool isIn = false;
00073 
00074     if(index[0] >= 0 && index[0] < (unsigned int)region.GetSize(0) &&
00075        index[1] >= 0 && index[1] < (unsigned int)region.GetSize(1) &&
00076        index[2] >= 0 && index[2] < (unsigned int)region.GetSize(2))
00077         isIn = (mask->GetPixel(index) > 0) ? true : false;
00078 
00079     return isIn;
00080 }
00081 
00082 
00083 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00084 {
00085     // Command line variables
00086     std::string dwiFileName;
00087     std::string vecFileName;
00088     unsigned int valFileName;
00089     std::string maskFileName;
00090     std::string labelFilename;
00091     std::vector<int> select_labels;
00092 
00093     std::string outFibersFileName;
00094 
00095     bool verboseMode;
00096     bool quietMode;
00097     bool saveTmpFiles;
00098     bool lps;
00099 
00100     Real stepSize;
00101     Real seedSpacing;
00102     Real faThreshold;
00103 
00104     std::string inRadix;
00105 
00106 
00107     try
00108     {
00109         //
00110         // Program's command line parser definition
00111         //
00112 
00113             // Defines command line parser
00114             TCLAP::CmdLine cmd("BTK Tractography", ' ', "0.2");
00115 
00116             // Defines arguments
00117             TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string>   dwiArg("d", "dwi", "Dwi sequence", true, "", "string", cmd);
00118             TCLAP::ValueArg<unsigned int>   valArg("b", "b_values", "B-values", true, 1500, "unsigned int", cmd);
00119             TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string>  maskArg("m", "mask", "White matter mask", true, "", "string", cmd);
00120             TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> labelArg("l", "label", "Label volume of seeds", true, "", "string", cmd);
00121             TCLAP::MultiArg<int>        labelsArg("", "labels", "Label select for processing", false, "int", cmd);
00122 
00123             TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> outFibersArg("", "fibers", "Output fibers file", false, "fibers", "string", cmd);
00124             TCLAP::SwitchArg lpsSwitchArg("", "lps", "Word coordinates expressed in LPS (Left-Posterior-Superior). By default RAS (Right-Anterior-Superior) is used.", cmd, false);
00125 
00126             TCLAP::SwitchArg verboseSwitchArg("", "verbose", "Display more informations on standard output", cmd, false);
00127             TCLAP::SwitchArg quietSwitchArg("", "quiet", "Display no information on either standard and error outputs", cmd, false);
00128             TCLAP::SwitchArg saveTmpSwitchArg("", "save_temporary_files", "Save diffusion signal, model coefficients, variance and spherical coordinates of gradient directions in files", cmd, false);
00129 
00130 
00131             TCLAP::ValueArg<Real>    stepSizeArg("", "step_size", "Step size of particles displacement", false, 0.5, "Real", cmd);
00132             TCLAP::ValueArg<Real>    seedSpacingArg("", "seed_spacing", "Spacing in mm between seeds", false, 1.0, "Real", cmd);
00133             TCLAP::ValueArg<Real>    faThresholdArg("", "fa_threshold", "Fractional Anisotropy (FA) threshold for algorithm stop", false, 0.2, "Real", cmd);
00134 
00135             // Parsing arguments
00136             cmd.parse(argc, argv);
00137 
00138             // Get back arguments' values
00139             dwiFileName    = dwiArg.getValue();
00140             valFileName    = valArg.getValue();
00141             maskFileName   = maskArg.getValue();
00142             labelFilename  = labelArg.getValue();
00143             select_labels  = labelsArg.getValue();
00144 
00145             outFibersFileName = outFibersArg.getValue();
00146 
00147             verboseMode  = verboseSwitchArg.getValue();
00148             quietMode    = quietSwitchArg.getValue();
00149             saveTmpFiles = saveTmpSwitchArg.getValue();
00150             lps          = lpsSwitchArg.getValue();
00151 
00152             stepSize       = stepSizeArg.getValue();
00153             seedSpacing    = seedSpacingArg.getValue();
00154             faThreshold    = faThresholdArg.getValue();
00155 
00156             inRadix     = GetRadixOf(dwiFileName);
00157             vecFileName = inRadix + ".bvec";
00158     }
00159     catch(TCLAP::ArgException &e)
00160     {
00161         std::cout << "TCLAP error: " << e.error() << " for argument " << e.argId() << std::endl;
00162         std::exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00163     }
00164 
00165 
00166     char displayMode = quietMode ? 0 : (verboseMode ? 2 : 1);
00167 
00168 
00169     //
00170     // Diffusion signal extraction
00171     //
00172 
00173         DTFPSignalExtractor *extractor = new DTFPSignalExtractor(vecFileName, dwiFileName, maskFileName, displayMode);
00174         extractor->extract();
00175 
00176         std::vector<Vector> *directions  = extractor->GetDirections();
00177         Sequence::Pointer       signal   = extractor->GetSignal();
00178         std::vector<Real>      *sigmas   = extractor->GetSigmas();
00179         Mask::Pointer           mask     = extractor->GetMask();
00180         Image::Pointer          baseline = extractor->GetBaseline();
00181 
00182         if(saveTmpFiles)
00183             extractor->save();
00184 
00185         delete extractor;
00186 
00187 
00188 
00189     //
00190     // Tractography (tensor and streamline propagation)
00191     //
00192 
00193         // Get signal function
00194         DTFPSignal *signalFun = new DTFPSignal(signal, sigmas, directions, valFileName, baseline, displayMode);
00195 
00196         // Read label image if any and verify sizes
00197         LabelMapReader::Pointer labelReader = LabelMapReader::New();
00198         labelReader->SetFileName(labelFilename);
00199         labelReader->Update();
00200         LabelMap::Pointer labelVolume = labelReader->GetOutput();
00201 
00202 
00203         // Initialize output structures
00204         std::vector<int> labels;
00205         std::vector<vtkSmartPointer<vtkAppendPolyData> > fibers;
00206 
00207 
00208         // Resample label map
00209         LabelResampler::Pointer labelResampler = LabelResampler::New();
00210         labelResampler->SetInput(labelVolume);
00211 
00212         LabelInterpolator::Pointer labelInterpolator = LabelInterpolator::New();
00213         labelResampler->SetInterpolator(labelInterpolator);
00214 
00215         LabelMap::SpacingType spacing = labelVolume->GetSpacing();
00216         LabelMap::SizeType size = labelVolume->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize();
00217         size[0] *= spacing[0]/seedSpacing; size[1] *= spacing[1]/seedSpacing; size[2] *= spacing[2]/seedSpacing;
00218         labelResampler->SetSize(size);
00219 
00220         LabelMap::DirectionType direction = labelVolume->GetDirection();
00221         labelResampler->SetOutputDirection(direction);
00222 
00223         LabelMap::PointType origin = labelVolume->GetOrigin();
00224         labelResampler->SetOutputOrigin(origin);
00225 
00226         spacing[0] = seedSpacing; spacing[1] = seedSpacing; spacing[2] = seedSpacing;
00227         labelResampler->SetOutputSpacing(spacing);
00228 
00229         labelResampler->Update();
00230         LabelMap::Pointer resampledLabelVolume = labelResampler->GetOutput();
00231 
00232         // Apply filter on each labeled voxels
00233         LabelMapIterator labelIt(resampledLabelVolume, resampledLabelVolume->GetLargestPossibleRegion());
00234 
00235 
00236         // Apply filter on each labeled voxels
00237         LabelMapIterator it(labelVolume, labelVolume->GetLargestPossibleRegion());
00238 
00239 
00240         unsigned int numOfSeeds = 0;
00241 
00242         for(labelIt.GoToBegin(); !labelIt.IsAtEnd(); ++labelIt)
00243         {
00244             if(labelIt.Get() > 0 &&
00245                (select_labels.size() == 0 ||
00246                 *std::find(select_labels.begin(),select_labels.end(),labelIt.Get()) == labelIt.Get()) )
00247                 numOfSeeds++;
00248         }
00249 
00250         unsigned int numOfSeedsDone = 0;
00251 
00252         std::cout << std::fixed;
00253         std::cout << std::setprecision(2);
00254         Display1(displayMode, std::cout << "Running tractography..." << std::endl);
00255         for(it.GoToBegin(); !it.IsAtEnd(); ++it)
00256         {
00257             int label = (int)it.Get();
00258 
00259             if(label > 0 &&
00260                (select_labels.size() == 0 ||
00261                 *std::find(select_labels.begin(),select_labels.end(),label) == label) )
00262             {
00263                 Image::IndexType index = it.GetIndex();
00264 
00265                 itk::Point<Real,3> worldPoint;
00266                 labelVolume->TransformIndexToPhysicalPoint(index, worldPoint);
00267 
00268                 Mask::IndexType maskIndex;
00269                 mask->TransformPhysicalPointToIndex(worldPoint, maskIndex);
00270 
00271                 // If the seed is not in the mask, there is no need to continue this one
00272                 if(mask->GetPixel(maskIndex) != 0)
00273                 {
00274                     Point begin(worldPoint[0], worldPoint[1], worldPoint[2]);
00275 
00276 
00277                     // Let's start filtering
00278                     Display1(displayMode, std::cout << "\tProgress: " << (Real)numOfSeedsDone / (Real)numOfSeeds * 100 << "%\r" << std::flush);
00279                     Display2(displayMode, std::cout << "\tSeed's world coordinates: (" << worldPoint[0] << "," << worldPoint[1] << "," << worldPoint[2] << ")" << std::endl);
00280                     Display2(displayMode, std::cout << "\tSeed's image coordinates: (" << maskIndex[0] << "," << maskIndex[1] << "," << maskIndex[2] << ")" << std::endl);
00281 
00282 
00283                     //
00284                     // Streamline propagation
00285                     //
00286 
00287                     // Entrées : signalFun, mask, begin, stepSize, faThreshold
00288                     // Sortie : fiber (vtkPolyData)
00289 
00290                     // Principe : propagation streamline (suivi direction de chaque tenseur -à chaque point de l'image) en avançant dans la direction d'un pas égal à stepSize
00291                     // Condition d'arrêt : FA inférieure à un seuil
00292 
00293                     // Algorithme
00294                     // chercher direction max du point courant et sa symétrique
00295                     // pour chaque direction, exécuter les instructions suivantes :
00296                     // initialiser dernière direction à la direction de départ
00297                     // initialiser le point courant à begin + déplacement dans la dernière direction
00298                     // initialiser continuer à vrai
00299                     // tant qu'on peut continuer
00300                     // faire
00301                     // |    si point courant pas dans le masque ou fa sous le seuil
00302                     // |    |   alors stop
00303                     // |    |   sinon propager dans la direction adéquate du tenseur (demi-sphère) et mettre à jour point courant et dernière direction
00304                     // |    fsi
00305                     // ffaire
00306 
00307                     // Variables
00308                     Direction lastDirection;
00309                     Point currentPoint;
00310                     std::vector<Point> part1, part2;
00311                     std::vector<Real> fa1, fa2;
00312                     bool goOn;
00313 
00314                     itk::Point<Real,3> worldPoint;
00315                     worldPoint[0] = begin.x(); worldPoint[1] = begin.y(); worldPoint[2] = begin.z();
00316 
00317                     itk::ContinuousIndex<Real,3> continuousIndex;
00318                     if(!mask->TransformPhysicalPointToContinuousIndex(worldPoint, continuousIndex))
00319                     {
00320                         std::cout << "Error: continuous index not in image !" << std::endl;
00321                         std::cerr << "(" << worldPoint[0] << "," << worldPoint[1] << "," << worldPoint[2] << ") --> (" << continuousIndex[0] << "," << continuousIndex[1] << "," << continuousIndex[2] << ")" << std::endl;
00322                         exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00323                     }
00324 
00325                     Point start(continuousIndex[0], continuousIndex[1], continuousIndex[2]);
00326 
00327                     // Get maximal and symetric directions at start
00328                     itk::DiffusionTensor3D<Real> maxDirTensor = signalFun->DiffusionTensorAt(start);
00329                     itk::FixedArray<Real,3> eigenValues;
00330                     itk::Matrix<Real,3,3> eigenVectors;
00331                     maxDirTensor.ComputeEigenAnalysis(eigenValues,eigenVectors);
00332                     Direction maxDirection = Vector(eigenVectors(2,0),eigenVectors(2,1),eigenVectors(2,2)).toDirection();
00333                     Direction symDirection(
00334                             M_PI - maxDirection.theta(),
00335                             (maxDirection.phi() < M_PI) ? maxDirection.phi() + M_PI : maxDirection.phi() - M_PI
00336                     );
00337 
00338                     // Treat maximal direction
00339                     lastDirection = maxDirection;
00340                     currentPoint = start + lastDirection.toVector()*stepSize;
00341                     part1.push_back(currentPoint);
00342                     fa1.push_back(maxDirTensor.GetFractionalAnisotropy());
00343                     goOn = true;
00344 
00345                     while(goOn)
00346                     {
00347                         itk::DiffusionTensor3D<Real> tensor = signalFun->DiffusionTensorAt(currentPoint);
00348 
00349                         if(!IsInsideMask(currentPoint,mask) || tensor.GetFractionalAnisotropy() < faThreshold)
00350                         {
00351                             goOn = false;
00352                         }
00353                         else // IsInsideMask(currentPoint,mask) && tensor.GetFractionalAnisotropy() >= faThreshold
00354                         {
00355                             itk::FixedArray<Real,3> eigenValues;
00356                             itk::Matrix<Real,3,3> eigenVectors;
00357                             tensor.ComputeEigenAnalysis(eigenValues,eigenVectors);
00358 
00359                             Vector lastVector = lastDirection.toVector();
00360                             Vector newVector(eigenVectors(2,0),eigenVectors(2,1),eigenVectors(2,2));
00361 
00362                             Real scalProd = newVector.x()*lastVector.x() + newVector.y()*lastVector.y() + newVector.z()*lastVector.z();
00363                             Real normU    = newVector.x()*newVector.x() + newVector.y()*newVector.y() + newVector.z()*newVector.z();
00364                             Real normV    = lastVector.x()*lastVector.x() + lastVector.y()*lastVector.y() + lastVector.z()*lastVector.z();
00365                             Real alpha    = std::acos( scalProd / std::sqrt(normU * normV) );
00366 
00367                             Direction mean = newVector.toDirection();
00368 
00369                             if(alpha > M_PI/2.0)
00370                             {
00371                                 mean = Direction(
00372                                         M_PI - mean.theta(),
00373                                         (mean.phi() < M_PI) ? mean.phi() + M_PI : mean.phi() - M_PI
00374                                 );
00375                             }
00376 
00377                             lastDirection = mean;
00378                             currentPoint = currentPoint + mean.toVector()*stepSize;
00379                             part1.push_back(currentPoint);
00380                             fa1.push_back(tensor.GetFractionalAnisotropy());
00381                         }
00382                     }
00383 
00384                     // Treat symetric direction
00385                     lastDirection = symDirection;
00386                     currentPoint = start + lastDirection.toVector()*stepSize;
00387                     part2.push_back(currentPoint);
00388                     fa2.push_back(maxDirTensor.GetFractionalAnisotropy());
00389                     goOn = true;
00390 
00391                     while(goOn)
00392                     {
00393                         itk::DiffusionTensor3D<Real> tensor = signalFun->DiffusionTensorAt(currentPoint);
00394 
00395                         if(!IsInsideMask(currentPoint,mask) || tensor.GetFractionalAnisotropy() < faThreshold)
00396                         {
00397                             goOn = false;
00398                         }
00399                         else // IsInsideMask(currentPoint,mask) && tensor.GetFractionalAnisotropy() >= faThreshold
00400                         {
00401                             itk::FixedArray<Real,3> eigenValues;
00402                             itk::Matrix<Real,3,3> eigenVectors;
00403                             tensor.ComputeEigenAnalysis(eigenValues,eigenVectors);
00404 
00405                             Vector lastVector = lastDirection.toVector();
00406                             Vector newVector(eigenVectors(2,0),eigenVectors(2,1),eigenVectors(2,2));
00407 
00408                             Real scalProd = newVector.x()*lastVector.x() + newVector.y()*lastVector.y() + newVector.z()*lastVector.z();
00409                             Real normU    = newVector.x()*newVector.x() + newVector.y()*newVector.y() + newVector.z()*newVector.z();
00410                             Real normV    = lastVector.x()*lastVector.x() + lastVector.y()*lastVector.y() + lastVector.z()*lastVector.z();
00411                             Real alpha    = std::acos( scalProd / std::sqrt(normU * normV) );
00412 
00413                             Direction mean = newVector.toDirection();
00414 
00415                             if(alpha > M_PI/2.0)
00416                             {
00417                                 mean = Direction(
00418                                         M_PI - mean.theta(),
00419                                         (mean.phi() < M_PI) ? mean.phi() + M_PI : mean.phi() - M_PI
00420                                 );
00421                             }
00422 
00423                             lastDirection = mean;
00424                             currentPoint = currentPoint + mean.toVector()*stepSize;
00425                             part2.push_back(currentPoint);
00426                             fa2.push_back(tensor.GetFractionalAnisotropy());
00427                         }
00428                     }
00429 
00430 
00431                     //
00432                     // Compute polydata
00433                     //
00434 
00435                     // VTK structures
00436                     vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyData> fiber = vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyData>::New();
00437 
00438                     vtkSmartPointer<vtkPoints>   points = vtkSmartPointer<vtkPoints>::New();
00439                     vtkSmartPointer<vtkCellArray> lines = vtkSmartPointer<vtkCellArray>::New();
00440                     vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyLine>   line = vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyLine>::New();
00441                     vtkSmartPointer<vtkDoubleArray>  fa = vtkSmartPointer<vtkDoubleArray>::New();
00442 
00443                     // Data
00444                     vtkIdType pid;
00445                     unsigned int id = 0;
00446                     double  valueFA = 0;
00447 
00448                     ImageContinuousIndex ci;
00449                     Image::PointType wp;
00450 
00451 
00452                     // Build fiber with the fiber in world coordinates
00453                     fa->SetNumberOfComponents(1);
00454                     line->GetPointIds()->SetNumberOfIds(part1.size() + part2.size());
00455 
00456                     // First point
00457                     Point p = part1[part1.size()-1];
00458                     ci[0] = p.x(); ci[1] = p.y(); ci[2] = p.z();
00459                     mask->TransformContinuousIndexToPhysicalPoint(ci,wp);
00460 
00461                     if(lps)
00462                         pid = points->InsertNextPoint(wp[0], wp[1], wp[2]);
00463                     else // ras
00464                         pid = points->InsertNextPoint(-wp[0], -wp[1], wp[2]);
00465 
00466                     valueFA = fa1[fa1.size()-1];
00467                     fa->InsertNextTuple(&valueFA);
00468                     line->GetPointIds()->SetId(id++,pid);
00469 
00470                     // First part
00471                     for(int k=part1.size()-2; k>=0; k--)
00472                     {
00473                         Point p = part1[k];
00474 
00475                         Image::PointType wp;
00476                         ImageContinuousIndex cip;
00477 
00478                         cip[0] = p.x(); cip[1] = p.y(); cip[2] = p.z();
00479                         mask->TransformContinuousIndexToPhysicalPoint(cip, wp);
00480 
00481                         if(lps)
00482                             pid = points->InsertNextPoint(wp[0], wp[1], wp[2]);
00483                         else // ras
00484                             pid = points->InsertNextPoint(-wp[0], -wp[1], wp[2]);
00485 
00486                         valueFA = fa1[k];
00487                         fa->InsertNextTuple(&valueFA);
00488                         line->GetPointIds()->SetId(id++,pid);
00489                     }
00490 
00491 
00492                     // Last part
00493                     for(unsigned int k=0; k<part2.size(); k++)
00494                     {
00495                         Point p = part2[k];
00496 
00497                         Image::PointType wp;
00498                         ImageContinuousIndex cip;
00499 
00500                         cip[0] = p.x(); cip[1] = p.y(); cip[2] = p.z();
00501                         mask->TransformContinuousIndexToPhysicalPoint(cip, wp);
00502 
00503                         if(lps)
00504                             pid = points->InsertNextPoint(wp[0], wp[1], wp[2]);
00505                         else // ras
00506                             pid = points->InsertNextPoint(-wp[0], -wp[1], wp[2]);
00507 
00508                         valueFA = fa2[k];
00509                         fa->InsertNextTuple(&valueFA);
00510                         line->GetPointIds()->SetId(id++,pid);
00511                     }
00512 
00513                     lines->InsertNextCell(line);
00514                     fiber->SetPoints(points);
00515                     fiber->SetLines(lines);
00516                     fiber->GetPointData()->SetScalars(fa);
00517 
00518 
00519                     // Save data
00520 
00521                     for(int l=fibers.size(); l<label; l++)
00522                         labels.push_back(-1);
00523 
00524                     if(labels[label-1] == -1)
00525                     {
00526                         fibers.push_back(vtkSmartPointer<vtkAppendPolyData>::New());
00527                         labels[label-1] = fibers.size()-1;
00528                     }
00529 
00530 
00531                     fibers[labels[label-1]]->AddInput(fiber);
00532 
00533                     Display2(displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00534 
00535                     numOfSeedsDone++;
00536                 }
00537             }
00538         } // for each labeled voxels
00539         Display1(displayMode, std::cout << "\tProgress: 100.00%" << std::endl << "done." << std::endl);
00540 
00541         delete signalFun;
00542         delete directions;
00543         delete sigmas;
00544 
00545 
00546     //
00547     // Writing files
00548     //
00549 
00550         // Write fiber polydata
00551         for(unsigned int label = 0; label < labels.size(); label++)
00552         {
00553             unsigned int nbOfInputs = fibers[labels[label]]->GetNumberOfInputPorts();
00554             bool saveFibers = true;
00555             unsigned int i = 0;
00556 
00557             do
00558             {
00559                 if(fibers[labels[label]]->GetNumberOfInputConnections(i++) < 1)
00560                     saveFibers = false;
00561             } while(saveFibers && i<nbOfInputs);
00562 
00563             if(saveFibers)
00564             {
00565                 std::stringstream filename;
00566                 filename << outFibersFileName << "-" << label+1 << ".vtk";
00567 
00568                 fibers[label]->Update();
00569                 vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyDataWriter> writer = vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyDataWriter>::New();
00570                 writer->SetInput(fibers[labels[label]]->GetOutput());
00571                 writer->SetFileName(filename.str().c_str());
00572                 writer->Write();
00573             }
00574         }
00575 
00576 
00577     return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00578 }
